title: LF people to help me learn adc
body:
Hey, ive been getting into kai'a and want to learn how to play adc. If anyone can add me and help me please do thank you : )
IGN: Valico

replies.body:
Hi Valico,

I'm part of a community where we provided structured training sessions for people who want to improve. It's a little different to what you're asking for, but I think you'll be interested in the format we offer.

Our discord server is at https://discord.gg/Ze3a2aK and our latest session announcement can be found on our twitter too:
[https://twitter.com/_BambooProject/status/1082173291891089408](https://twitter.com/_BambooProject/status/1082173291891089408)

This invitation is open to anyone else who's interested too. Hopefully I'll see some of you around soon
Hey man i can give you 1 on 1 training add me on league : TSM Mason
